participant_1.background:
I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest and saw a sloth in the wild.
i work in finance.
i recently had a private lunch with will ferrell.
i had one step dad , and fortunately he ignored me.

participant_2.background:
My favorite place to eat is at home because I can control the ingredients and create my own unique recipes.
i thought of joining the military when i was younger.
i am an accountant.
i love to play tennis.
i have 10 alpacas.

content.text: Doing well! I am a finance worker who just opened a juicing bar. Do you have any ideas how I can get the word out about it?
Oh wow! That is really cool. I love juicing. Have you tried advertising on social media?
I have not yet, but I will look into it. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I am an accountant so I am always thinking about ways to advertise. I also love tennis. Do you play?
I used to play when I was younger but I haven't in a while. I need to get back into it.
You should! It is a great way to stay in shape and destress. I have 10 alpacas. I love them.
Oh wow! That is a lot of alpacas. Do you have a farm?
Yes, I have a farm outside of the city. I love spending time there.
That sounds amazing. I would love to see your farm sometime.
You are welcome to come anytime!
